thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com
thread.title: Terry Gray

author: Terry Gray
title: Terry Gray
text: The car we hired was a Renault Cleo 4 door which was fairly new, roomy and perfect for touring the island of Fuerteventura. The only thing I would recommend potential customers to do, is double check the external condition of the vehicle before use. We didn't do this and were then worried that we would be blamed for a scrape on the front wing/bumper that had been done prior to us hiring the car. Fortunately, when returning the car this wasn't the case, as the staff knew the damage was already there before we hired it.
